name: Arjun Kumar
text: Cuephoria is absolutely amazing! The PS5 gaming setup is top-notch and the pool tables are in perfect condition. Perfect place to hang out with friends after college.

name: Priya Sharma
text: Love the ambiance and the gaming experience here! The staff is super friendly and the student discounts make it very affordable. Highly recommend!

name: Rahul Menon
text: Great place for gaming and pool. The neon lighting creates such a cool atmosphere. Only wish they had more variety in snacks, but overall excellent experience!

name: Sneha Reddy
text: This place is a gem in Trichy! Perfect spot for students to unwind. The gaming stations are well-maintained and the pool tables are professional quality.

name: Vikram Singh
text: Cuephoria has become my go-to place for entertainment. The cyberpunk vibes are incredible and the tournaments they organize are so much fun!
